-e ---

𓎔 ≈ 𓆹 ≈ 𓊷 ?

𓎔 ¬ 𓎕 But often confused

𓎔 ≈ 𒅎 in 𒂈 mir 𒅎𒂇 north (wind) 𒅎𒅎 mermer₃ 𒈬𒊒 #marru 𒈥𒋽 #marru 𒈨𒄷 #mehû 𓇇 𓎔 #mḥ

𓎔 𓈗 #mḥʳ mar

𓎔 𓏏 #mḥt ⋍ Mediterranean sea

𓎔 𓏏 kumeð mūːm-ā "full" @ Omotic

𓎔 𓏏 #mḥt •mnoḥt north Nord ⇔ 𒅎 •INM 𐀀𐀚𐀗 a-ne-mo ἄνεμος ánemos 𓎔 #mḥ maxim ↑ ?

𓎔 𓏏 𓇇 | Delta marshes| #mḥt mud-marsh ⇔ North / Flood <?> 𓏏 𓇇 Delta

𓋴 𓐍 𓏏 𓇏 𓈅 | marshland | scrit •mascarith мочурище močurište moczar™ marsh

Three confused readings 𓎔 ¬ 𓎕

𓎕 North N-R-D 𓎕 𓎛 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 Nord にし Nahrid: Fish شمال šamāl ⇔ salmon ⇔ [knot]
M-H-T Meerit Mehit µ⋍𓎕 …ϩⲏⲧ …hēt شمال šamāl < mer 𓎕 𓎛
𓎔 𓂝 𓎛 𓏯 ne‛ôreth flax

𓎕 Gourd G-R-D 𓋴 𓐍 𓏏 𓇏 𓈅 ⋍ 𓐍 𓂧 𓊛 North : ϧⲏⲧ xēt хойд Krete きた kita גרביא garbyā ищхъэрэ ŝχără
𓊪K-R-d bakur(D) باکور back 북 buk 北 báe̤k 北 běi (cardinal back)

𓎕 ᵍF-L-Dh Flood/Flasch'/Fish < Becher bakur باکور sibir север sever

𓎔 gada 𜘢 cat ?
𓎔 cordel 𒃰 GADA 𓎔 𓎛 𓏏 𓇇 𓆰 𓏪 flax
𓎔 gourd 𓎔 𓎛 𓏏 𓇇 𓆰 𓏪 flax 𒃰 gada kitû կտաւ ktaw кӱдели küdeli "flax" кеден keden كَتَّان kattān "flax"
𓎔 gourd 𓎕 Gurt 𓎔 𓂝 𓇋 𓇋 𓀭 guardian
𓎔 gourd = Flaschenkürbis
𓎔 𓎛 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓊡 𓈗||storm from the north| Ghrjd :
𓎔 > caurus ⋍ current / course / cross / cardial?
𓎔 > Schauer,cavrus > sever@Slav ⇔ Zaphon צָּפוֹן!
𓈎 𓂋 𓂋 𓊡||storm, storm - cloud| coort@LAT कोहरा kohrād > cloud
𓐍 𓂧 𓊛||flow (of water)| current 𓐍=cr 𓂧=hand/don/cheir
𓐍 𓂧 𓊛||travel downstream| Kardin = 'Down'
𓐍 𓂧 𓊛||North| KURD? Kardin = 'Down' ☑
𓐍 𓂧 𓊛||North| bakur < pa Kurd ("The North") ☑
𓐍 𓂧 𓊛||travel downstream, northwards, North| cruise ⇔ course / 🕂 cross 𓇼 ?
𓐍 𓂧 𓏏 𓏛||land - register|Karte / Kadaster
𓐍 𓂧 𓊛||North| Kurd => specific ethnonyms of many more or less related PIE 'northeners':
Kurd | Gudea | Ghat | Hatti⋍Hittite | Gauls | Kelten | Goth | Gutes | Geats

𓎔 ⋍? 𓈎𓂋𓂋 ⋍ kryo : cold

[knot]

𒆥𒈾𒍪 qin-na-zu •qinzu qamçı ҡамсы qamsï камши́к kamšík cambuk @Turk=>Slav 𓋴 𓏇 𓇋 𓄛 𓏤 •gamisi/gamiter
𒆥𒈾𒍪 qin-na-zu ⇔ 𓎕𓎔 кнутъ knutŭ кнут knut Knute •Kaniete knútr “knot” “knotty whip” 𓎔
𒆥𒈾𒍪 whip ⇔ μάστιξ ᵏmástix > մտրակ mtrak

𓎔 Flasche < Boras < βορράς
𓎔 उत्तर (uttar) < Bottle < βορράς
𓎔 उत्तर (uttar) ⋍ Euter
𓎔 Flasche ⋍ צָּפוֹן (he) (tsafón) ⇔ Mount Zaphon! > sever@Slav
𓎕 Flegel(whip)

𓎔 𓏛 fill (v. trans.)
𓎔 𓏛 full
𓎔 𓏏 𓈗 flood
𓎔 𓏛 𓅓 full measure
𓎔 𓏏 Flats: North

full vs 𓏏 𓏏 total

𓎕 𓎔 G-R-D / N-R-D ⇔ Q-N-D

𒆥𒈾𒍪 qin-na-zu •qinzu qamçı ҡамсы qamsï камши́к kamšík cambuk @Turk=>Slav 𓋴 𓏇 𓇋 𓄛 𓏤 “whip” •gamisi/gamiter
𒆥𒈾𒍪 qin-na-zu кнутъ knutŭ кнут knut Knute •Kaniete knútr “knot” “knotty whip” 𓎔 𓎕
𒆥𒈾𒍪 whip 𓏇 ⇔ μάστιξ ᵏmástix > մտրակ mtrak
⇔ 𓆑 Cten : Crete Κρήτη whip snake
